titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: INTRAVENTRICULAR HAEMORRHAGE GRADE (LEFT SIDE) - Description

body.p: INTRAVENTRICULAR HAEMORRHAGE GRADE (LEFT SIDE) is the same as attribute INTRAVENTRICULAR HAEMORRHAGE GRADE in the left side of the cranium.

For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care , INTRAVENTRICULAR HAEMORRHAGE GRADE (LEFT SIDE) is the most severe INTRAVENTRICULAR HAEMORRHAGE GRADE seen on the left side of the cranium during a cranial Ultrasound Scan .
